snippet.title: MWT: Tank Battles — Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
The new gameplay trailer gives a glimpse of what the game will look like at launch.

Register now:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Shooter.ModernWarfront

Artstorm Studio and Gaijin Entertainment announce the start of pre-registration for the new military online shooter MWT: Tank Battles. Players who apply now will receive the T54E1 tank with a unique camouflage as a welcome bonus on the day the game will be made available. Pre-registration is active on Android devices only, while the release of MWT is scheduled for 2024 on both Android and iOS.

• Site - https://artstorm.com/en-US/tank-battles
• Discord - https://discord.gg/mwt-tankbattles
• Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/mwttankbattles
• Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/mwt_tank_battles/
• X - https://twitter.com/MWTankBattles
• Telegram - https://t.me/MWTTankBattles
